alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 11:47AM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds shifting southwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Ohio, Cuyahoga, Lake and Ashtabula Lakeshore Counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Erie and Southern Erie Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southeast winds are expected this evening, followed by strong southwest winds Saturday morning and afternoon. Gusts will gradually subside Saturday night.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
